level.text: To be eligible to receive a contract from the Department, a prospective contractor must satisfy two (2) basic qualification requirements.
Not be disqualified on the basis of conflicts of interest either personal or organizational, or related ethical concerns.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 8805 (October 14, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 985, 989 (February 10, 2012).
